alert.note: Alert for Custer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 11:03PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Custer County through 1145 PM CDT... At 1102 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Callaway, or 18 miles west of Broken Bow, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Callaway, Oconto, Finchville, Lodi, Pressey State Wildlife Management Area and Milldale. This includes Highway 92 between mile markers 262 and 266. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
